info.text: Changes made outside the main menu require sleeping or reloading the save.
enabled.label: Enabled
buff-power.label: Buff Power
debugging.label: Debugging
enable-logging.label: Enable Logging
enable-logging.tooltip: Shows informational logs in SMAPI console.
general-page.label: General Buffs
health-buff.label: Health Buff
health-buff.tooltip:
Max Health granted per Stardrop.
Default: 14
health-regen.label: Health Regen
stamina-buff.label: Stamina Buff
stamina-buff.tooltip:
Max Stamina granted per Stardrop.
Default 6
stamina-regen.label: Stamina Regen
magnetic-buff.label: Magnetic Radius Buff
magnetic-buff.tooltip:
Every 64 points of Magnetic Radius increase should equate to about 1 tile distance.
Default: 64
speed-buff.label: Speed Buff
speed-buff.tooltip:
Increases movement speed, including while mounted (1 point is equivalent to coffee speed).
Default: 0.3
combat-page.label: Combat Buffs
attack-buff.label: Attack Buff
attack-multiplier-buff.label: Attack Multiplier Buff
attack-multiplier-buff.tooltip:
Multiplies the player's attack damage.
Default: 0.03
critical-chance-multiplier-buff.label: Critical Chance Multiplier Buff
critical-chance-multiplier-buff.tooltip:
Multiplies the player's critical hit chance.
Default: 0.03
critical-power-multiplier-buff.label: Critical Power Multiplier Buff
critical-power-multiplier-buff.tooltip:
Multiplies the player's critical damage.
Default: 0.03
knockback-multiplier-buff.label: Knockback Multiplier Buff
knockback-multiplier-buff.tooltip:
Multiplies monster knockback when hit by player.
Default: 0.03
weapon-speed-multiplier-buff.label: Weapon Speed Multiplier Buff
defense-buff.label: Defense Buff
defense-buff.tooltip:
Each point of Defense reduces incoming damage by 1.
Default: 3
immunity-buff.label: Immunity Buff
immunity-buff.tooltip:
Each point of Immunity reduces chance to be debuffed by 9.1%.
Default: 0.43
skills-page.label: Skill Buffs
skills-info.text: Every point of proficiency reduces energy cost by 0.1.
combat-buff.label: Combat Skill Level Buff
combat-buff.tooltip:
Every point in Combat increases HP by 5.
Default: 0.72
farming-buff.label: Farming Skill Level Buff
farming-buff.tooltip:
Every point in Farming increases Hoe and Watering Can proficiency by 1.
Default: 0.72
fishing-buff.label: Fishing Skill Level Buff
fishing-buff.tooltip:
Increasing Fishing has many benefits, check the wiki for more info.
Default: 0.72
foraging-buff.label: Foraging Skill Level Buff
foraging-buff.tooltip:
Every point in Foraging increases Axe proficiency by 1 and the chance of quality forage if you don't have the Botanist Profession.
Default: 0.72
luck-buff.label: Luck Skill Level Buff
luck-buff.tooltip:
Not implemented in base game, unsure if it works with the Luck Skill mod.
Default: 0.72
mining-buff.label: Mining Skill Level Buff
mining-buff.tooltip:
Every point in Mining increases Pickaxe proficiency by 1.
Default: 0.72
